title: Pirate Captain
summaries: The Pirate Captain is a Hardmode enemy which appears during the Pirate Invasion event. Upon being within line of sight of the player, he attacks using an assault rifle-like gun that shoots at a speed comparable to the Minishark, then stops to fire a single cannonball from its underbarrel mounted cannon while stationary. The cannonball has a short range and detonates upon impact with blocks, much like those fired from the Flying Dutchman(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), and deals immense amounts of damage.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, a <linked>Pirate's Curse</linked> will be spawned when a Pirate Captain is killed. It will slowly drift towards the player through walls much like <linked>Wraiths</linked>.

He is one of the few entities that can be detected by the Lifeform Analyzer(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) or its upgrades. The Pirate Captain requires 25 kills to be awarded completion of his Bestiary entry and corresponding banner, as opposed to the usual 50 kills.
